languages.text: {n}Маражай замирает{/n} "Что?.. Ты заслужил{mf||а} великую честь для кого-то вроде тебя... и теперь ты просто отказываешься от нее?" {n}В лице друкари появляется незнакомое вам выражение — искреннее изумление... и потаенную ярость. Он с утробным рыком прячет клинок с глаз и бросает на вас раскаленный от бешенства взгляд.{/n} "С меня довольно. Я ухожу... и больше не буду тратить время на твои сомнения и слабости, мон-кай".

{n}Marazhai freezes.{/n} "What...? This is a great honour for one such as you... and you are going to reject it?" {n}The expression on his face is new to you — one of genuine surprise... and simmering rage. With a guttural growl, he stows the blade and casts a baleful glare at you.{/n} "That is it. I am leaving... and I will not be wasting any more time on your doubts and weaknesses, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай замирает{/n} "Что?.. languages.text: {n}玛拉斋僵在了原地。{/n}“你说什么……？对你这样的人而言，这是何等的荣耀……可你却打算拒绝？”{n}你从来没见过他脸上露出这样的表情，他的表情中带着真挚的惊讶……以及闷燃的愤怒。他愤怒地咆哮一声，收回了刀，朝你投来了充满恶意的目光。{/n}“既然如此，我要走了……我不打算在你的疑虑与弱点上继续浪费时间了，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes.{/n} "What...? This is a great honour for one such as you... and you are going to reject it?" {n}The expression on his face is new to you — one of genuine surprise... and simmering rage. With a guttural growl, he stows the blade and casts a baleful glare at you.{/n} "That is it. I am leaving... and I will not be wasting any more time on your doubts and weaknesses, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋僵在了原地。{/n}“你说什么……？对你这样的人而言，这是何等的荣耀……可你却打算拒绝？”{n}你从来没见过他脸上露出这样的表情，他的表情中带着真挚的惊讶……以及闷燃的愤怒。他愤怒地咆哮一声，收回了刀，朝你投来了充满恶意的目光。{/n}“既然如此，我要走了……我不打算在你的疑虑与弱点上继续浪费时间了，猴子。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの動きが固まる。{/n}「何だって…？お前にとってはとても名誉なことなんだぞ…それを拒否するのか？」{n}初めて見る表情だ―そこにあるのは、心からの驚きと、煮えたぎる怒り。グルグルとうなり声を上げ、マラズハイは刃を納め、ギロリとこちらを睨んでいる。{/n}「終わりだ。俺は行く…お前の疑念や弱さに付き合って、これ以上時間を無駄にするつもりはない、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes.{/n} "What...? This is a great honour for one such as you... and you are going to reject it?" {n}The expression on his face is new to you — one of genuine surprise... and simmering rage. With a guttural growl, he stows the blade and casts a baleful glare at you.{/n} "That is it. I am leaving... and I will not be wasting any more time on your doubts and weaknesses, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの動きが固まる。{/n}「何だって…？お前にとってはとても名誉なことなんだぞ…それを拒否するのか？」{n}初めて見る表情だ―そこにあるのは、心からの驚きと、煮えたぎる怒り。グルグルとうなり声を上げ、マラズハイは刃を納め、ギロリとこちらを睨んでいる。{/n}「終わりだ。俺は行く…お前の疑念や弱さに付き合って、これ以上時間を無駄にするつもりはない、モン＝ケイ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se queda muy quieto.{/n} «¿Qué...? Esto es un gran honor para alguien como tú... ¿y lo vas a rechazar?». {n}La expresión de su rostro es nueva para ti; denota genuina sorpresa... y una furia a punto de estallar. Con un gruñido gutural, envaina el puñal y te fulmina con la mirada.{/n} «Se acabó. Me marcho... y no volveré a perder el tiempo con tus dudas y tu debilidad, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes.{/n} "What...? This is a great honour for one such as you... and you are going to reject it?" {n}The expression on his face is new to you — one of genuine surprise... and simmering rage. With a guttural growl, he stows the blade and casts a baleful glare at you.{/n} "That is it. I am leaving... and I will not be wasting any more time on your doubts and weaknesses, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se queda muy quieto.{/n} «¿Qué...? Esto es un gran honor para alguien como tú... ¿y lo vas a rechazar?». {n}La expresión de su rostro es nueva para ti; denota genuina sorpresa... y una furia a punto de estallar. Con un gruñido gutural, envaina el puñal y te fulmina con la mirada.{/n} «Se acabó. Me marcho... y no volveré a perder el tiempo con tus dudas y tu debilidad, mon-keigh».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise.{/n} « Pardon... ? C'est un immense honneur pour un individu de votre espèce et vous... vous le refuseriez ? » {n}Vous ne l'aviez encore jamais vu arborer une telle expression, subtil mélange de surprise et... de rage écumante. Avec un grondement guttural, il rengaine sa lame et vous adresse un regard noir.{/n} « Cette fois, c'en est trop. Je m'en vais... J'en ai fini de perdre mon temps avec vos doutes et vos faiblesses, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes.{/n} "What...? This is a great honour for one such as you... and you are going to reject it?" {n}The expression on his face is new to you — one of genuine surprise... and simmering rage. With a guttural growl, he stows the blade and casts a baleful glare at you.{/n} "That is it. I am leaving... and I will not be wasting any more time on your doubts and weaknesses, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'immobilise.{/n} « Pardon... ? C'est un immense honneur pour un individu de votre espèce et vous... vous le refuseriez ? » {n}Vous ne l'aviez encore jamais vu arborer une telle expression, subtil mélange de surprise et... de rage écumante. Avec un grondement guttural, il rengaine sa lame et vous adresse un regard noir.{/n} « Cette fois, c'en est trop. Je m'en vais... J'en ai fini de perdre mon temps avec vos doutes et vos faiblesses, mon-keigh. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt.{/n} "Was ...? Für jemanden wie Euch ist das eine große Ehre ... und Ihr lehnt sie ab?" {n}Den Ausdruck auf seinem Gesicht kanntest du bisher nicht – ein Ausdruck ehrlicher Überraschung ... und kochender Wut. Mit einem kehligen Knurren verstaut er die Klinge wieder und wirft dir einen unheilvollen Blick zu.{/n} "Es reicht. Ich gehe ... und ich lasse mich nicht länger von Euren Zweifeln und Schwächen aufhalten, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes.{/n} "What...? This is a great honour for one such as you... and you are going to reject it?" {n}The expression on his face is new to you — one of genuine surprise... and simmering rage. With a guttural growl, he stows the blade and casts a baleful glare at you.{/n} "That is it. I am leaving... and I will not be wasting any more time on your doubts and weaknesses, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai erstarrt.{/n} "Was ...? Für jemanden wie Euch ist das eine große Ehre ... und Ihr lehnt sie ab?" {n}Den Ausdruck auf seinem Gesicht kanntest du bisher nicht – ein Ausdruck ehrlicher Überraschung ... und kochender Wut. Mit einem kehligen Knurren verstaut er die Klinge wieder und wirft dir einen unheilvollen Blick zu.{/n} "Es reicht. Ich gehe ... und ich lasse mich nicht länger von Euren Zweifeln und Schwächen aufhalten, Chem-Pan-Sey."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai donakalıyor.{/n} "Ne? Senin gibi birisi için bu büyük bir onur ve... Sen bunu geri mi çevireceksin?" {n}Yüzündeki ifadeye aşina değilsin. Hakiki bir şaşkınlık ve... Parlamaya hazır bir öfke görüyorsun. Marazhai, gırtlaktan gelen bir hırıltıyla bıçağını yerine koyarak sana nefret dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Yetti artık. Ben gidiyorum... Kuşkuların ve zayıflıklarınla vaktimi daha fazla harcamayacağım mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai freezes.{/n} "What...? This is a great honour for one such as you... and you are going to reject it?" {n}The expression on his face is new to you — one of genuine surprise... and simmering rage. With a guttural growl, he stows the blade and casts a baleful glare at you.{/n} "That is it. I am leaving... and I will not be wasting any more time on your doubts and weaknesses, mon-keigh."

Parlamak üzere bir öfke görüyorsun. Marazhai, gırtlaktan gelen bir hırıltıyla bıçağını yerine koyarak sana nefret dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Yetti artık. Ben gidiyorum... Kuşkuların ve zayıflıklarınla vaktimi daha fazla harcamayacağım mon-keigh."
